title: Man Utd 1-0 Liverpool LIVE score: Team news, TV channel and live stream
text:
Liverpool can move eight points clear at the top of the table with victory at Manchester United on Sunday.

Jurgen Klopp's side have enjoyed an unblemished start to the campaign with eight wins from as many matches to set the pace in the title race.

Meanwhile, United have won just twice all season and are hovering just a point above the Premier League drop zone.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has been given a vote of confidence by Red Devils chief Ed Woodward but a heavy defeat at Old Trafford could push him closer to the exit door.

Man Utd XI: De Gea, Wan-Bissaka, Maguire, Lindelof, Rojo, Young, McTominay, Fred, Pereira, James, Rashford.

Liverpool XI: Alisson, Alexander-Arnold, Matip, Van Dijk, Robertson, Fabinho, Henderson, Wijnaldum, Mane, Firmino, Origi

Follow all the build up, action and reaction below.

The game will be televised on Sky Sports Premier League and Sky Sports Main Event and can be live streamed on the Sky Sports app.
description:
Liverpool 
 looks set to lose in the Premier League for the first time this season after Marcus Rashford handed Man Utd the lead at Old Trafford
